channel.title: Searches and Seizures on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: the People of the State of Colorado v. Shaun R. Davis
item.description: Published: April 2019 Abstract: " The Supreme Court, Hood, J., held that law enforcement’s use of defendant’s cell phone passcode to execute search warrant did not violate Fourth Amendment. Reversed and remanded”
